00051 #define NO_OF_THREADS 4
00052 #define NO_OF_CHANNELS 1                //  (int)log2() = k bits. 
00053 #define NO_OF_RANKS 2                   //  (int)log2() = l bits.
00054 #define NO_OF_BANKS 8                   //  (int)log2() = b bits. 
00055 #define NO_OF_BUFFERS NO_OF_BANKS
00056 #define NO_OF_ROWS 4096                 //4096 //  (int)log2() = r bits. 
00057 #define NO_OF_COLUMNS 256               //  (int)log2() = c bits. 
00058 #define COLUMN_SIZE 16                  //  (int)log2() = v bits.  Column Size = 2bytes
00059 #define BLOCKS_PER_ROW 64               //  (int)log2() = n bits.  Cache line Per Row
00060 #define CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE 64             //  (int)log2() = z bits.  L2 Cache Block Size
00061 #define ROW_SIZE NO_OF_COLUMNS*COLUMN_SIZE //(Also equal to BLOCKS_PER_ROW*CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE)
00062 #define DRAM_SIZE NO_OF_CHANNELS*NO_OF_RANKS*NO_OF_BANKS*NO_OF_ROWS*ROW_SIZE
00063 #define TAG_BITS 8                      // t bits
00064 
00065 #define THREAD_BITS_POSITION 12
00066 //#define CORE_UNCORE_RATIO 3
00067 #define MAX_BUFFER_SIZE 8       
00068 #define MAX_CMD_BUFFER_SIZE 4
00069 #define RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE (NO_OF_CHANNELS * (NO_OF_BANKS*NO_OF_RANKS + MAX_CMD_BUFFER_SIZE)) / 2  // Size = Upper Limit / 2

00085 #define REFRESH_PERIOD CORE_SPEED*64000                 // 64ms
00086 #define REFRESH_INC floor(REFRESH_PERIOD/(NO_OF_ROWS*NO_OF_RANKS)) - BUS_CYCLE  // -1 BUS_CYCLE to be on the safe side
00087 
00088 //  DDR3 1333 -6-6-6 Gbps memory system.  
00089 //  Composed of 2 Gbit chips.  2 ranks, each rank has 8 2Gbit(x8) chips.
00090 //  This is a 64 bit wide interface.
00091 //  Total is 4096 MB
00092 //  Bandwidth is  10.667 GB/s
00093 //  6-6-6 means 6*2 DDR half cycles for t_CAS and (6 / 1.333G/2) = 9ns for t_RCD, t_RP
00094 
00095 /*
00096 #define DDR_BUS_WIDTH 8         // 64 bit = 8 bytes
00097 #define BUS_SPEED 667           
00098 #define CORE_SPEED 3000         // 3G = 3000 cycles in 1us
00099 #define MEM_SPEED 1333
00100 #define MEM_CYCLE (CORE_SPEED*1.0 / MEM_SPEED)  
00101 #define BUS_CYCLE (CORE_SPEED*1.0 / BUS_SPEED)
00102 
00103 #define CYCLE_2_NS (CORE_SPEED*1.0 / 1000)
00104 
00105 #define t_CMD   ceil (1.0 * BUS_CYCLE)
00106 #define t_RCD   ceil (9 * CYCLE_2_NS)           // Taken from DRAMSim spd
00107 #define t_RRD   ceil (6 * CYCLE_2_NS)           // TODO FIXME In most cases doesn't matter
00108 #define t_RAS   ceil (30 * CYCLE_2_NS)          // Taken from DRAMSim spd
00109 #define t_CAS   6 * ceil (1.0 * MEM_CYCLE)      // 6-6-6 So 6 Mem Cycles
00110 #define t_RTRS  ceil (1.0 * MEM_CYCLE)
00111 #define t_OST   ceil (1.0 * MEM_CYCLE)
00112 #define t_WR    ceil (10 * CYCLE_2_NS)          // Taken from DRAMSim spd
00113 #define t_WTR   ceil (t_WR / 2)                 // TODO FIXME  t_WTR not defined and I took average of 0 and t_WR
00114 #define t_RP    ceil (9 * CYCLE_2_NS)           // Taken from DRAMSim spd
00115 #define t_CCD   ceil (DDR_BUS_WIDTH/2 * BUS_CYCLE)// TODO Bus Cycle = Half Mem Cycle. burst of 8 beats
00116 #define t_AL    0                               // No posted CAS will have t_AL = 0
00117 #define t_CWD   t_CAS-t_CMD
00118 #define t_RC    ceil (40.5 * CYCLE_2_NS)        // Taken from DRAMSim spd
00119 #define t_RTP   ceil (3.0 * MEM_CYCLE)          // TODO don't know yet. default in DRAMSim for DDR2 & DDR3 = 6 ddr half cycles 
00120 #define t_RFC   ceil (210 * CYCLE_2_NS)         // FIXME Taken from DRAMSim spd
00121 */
00122 
00123 //  DDR2 533 4-4-4 Mbps memory system. 
00124 //  Composed of 72 512 Mbit chips. 2 ranks   
00125 //  Total is 4 GB
00126 //  Bandwidth is 4.3 GB/s
00127 //  4-4-4 means 4*2 DDR half cycles for t_CAS and (4 / 533M/2) = 15ns for t_RCD, t_RP
00128 
00129 //  Corresponds to MT36HTJ51272Y-53E 4 GB part from Micron, aka PC2-4200 DRAM
00130 // non-registered mode (doesn't add a cycle)
00131 
00132 
00133 #define DDR_BUS_WIDTH 8         // 64 bit = 8 bytes
00134 #define BUS_SPEED 266           
00135 #define CORE_SPEED 3000         // 3G = 3000 cycles in 1us
00136 #define MEM_SPEED 533           //  artifact of not knowing correct timing values
00137 #define MEM_CYCLE (CORE_SPEED*1.0 / MEM_SPEED)  // artifact of not knowing correct timing values
00138 #define BUS_CYCLE (CORE_SPEED*1.0 / BUS_SPEED)
00139 
00140 #define CYCLE_2_NS (CORE_SPEED*1.0 / 1000)
00141 
00142 #define t_CMD   ceil (1.0 * BUS_CYCLE)
00143 #define t_RCD   ceil (15 * CYCLE_2_NS)          // Taken from datasheet
00144 #define t_RRD   ceil (6 * CYCLE_2_NS)           // TODO FIXME In most cases doesn't matter
00145 #define t_RAS   ceil (40 * CYCLE_2_NS)          // t_RAS = t_RC - t_RCD 
00146 #define t_CAS   4 * ceil (1.0 * MEM_CYCLE)      // 4-4-4 So 4 Mem Cycles
00147 #define t_RTRS  ceil (1.0 * MEM_CYCLE)
00148 #define t_OST   ceil (1.0 * MEM_CYCLE)
00149 #define t_WR    ceil (15 * CYCLE_2_NS)          // Taken from DRAMSim spd
00150 #define t_WTR   ceil (t_WR / 2)                 // TODO FIXME  t_WTR not defined and I took average of 0 and t_WR
00151 #define t_RP    ceil (15 * CYCLE_2_NS)          // Taken from datasheet
00152 #define t_CCD   ceil (DDR_BUS_WIDTH/2 * BUS_CYCLE)// TODO Bus Cycle = Half Mem Cycle. burst of 8 beats
00153 #define t_AL    0                               // No posted CAS will have t_AL = 0
00154 #define t_CWD   t_CAS-t_CMD
00155 #define t_RC    ceil (55 * CYCLE_2_NS)          // Taken from datasheet
00156 #define t_RTP   ceil (3.0 * MEM_CYCLE)          // TODO don't know yet. default in DRAMSim for DDR2 & DDR3 = 6 ddr half cycles 
00157 #define t_RFC   ceil (105 * CYCLE_2_NS)         // Taken from datasheet
00158 
00159 
00160 //  DDR2 667 Mbps memory system.  
00161 //  Composed of 1 Gbit chips.  1 rank, each rank has 5 1 Gbit (x8) chips.
00162 //  The 5th chip is for ECC, otherwise this is a 32 bit wide interface.
00163 //  Total is 512 MB
00164 //  Bandwidth is 2.67 GB/s
00165 //  4-4-4 means 4*2 DDR half cycles for t_CAS and (4 / 667M/2) = 12ns for t_RCD, t_RP
00166 
00167 /*
00168 #define DDR_BUS_WIDTH 4         // 32 bit = 4 bytes
00169 #define BUS_SPEED 333           
00170 #define CORE_SPEED 3000         // 3G = 3000 cycles in 1us
00171 #define MEM_SPEED 667           //  artifact of not knowing correct timing values
00172 #define MEM_CYCLE (CORE_SPEED*1.0 / MEM_SPEED)  // artifact of not knowing correct timing values
00173 #define BUS_CYCLE (CORE_SPEED*1.0 / BUS_SPEED)
00174 
00175 #define CYCLE_2_NS (CORE_SPEED*1.0 / 1000)
00176 
00177 #define t_CMD   ceil (1.0 * BUS_CYCLE)
00178 #define t_RCD   ceil (12 * CYCLE_2_NS)          // Taken from DRAMSim spd
00179 #define t_RRD   ceil (6 * CYCLE_2_NS)           // TODO FIXME In most cases doesn't matter
00180 #define t_RAS   ceil (45 * CYCLE_2_NS)          // Taken from DRAMSim spd
00181 #define t_CAS   4 * ceil (1.0 * MEM_CYCLE)      // 4-4-4 So 4 Mem Cycles
00182 #define t_RTRS  ceil (1.0 * MEM_CYCLE)
00183 #define t_OST   ceil (1.0 * MEM_CYCLE)
00184 #define t_WR    ceil (15 * CYCLE_2_NS)          // Taken from DRAMSim spd
00185 #define t_WTR   ceil (t_WR / 2)                 // TODO FIXME  t_WTR not defined and I took average of 0 and t_WR
00186 #define t_RP    ceil (12 * CYCLE_2_NS)          // Taken from DRAMSim spd
00187 #define t_CCD   ceil (DDR_BUS_WIDTH/2 * BUS_CYCLE)// TODO Bus Cycle = Half Mem Cycle. burst of 4 beats
00188 #define t_AL    0                               // No posted CAS will have t_AL = 0
00189 #define t_CWD   t_CAS-t_CMD
00190 #define t_RC    ceil (57 * CYCLE_2_NS)          // Taken from DRAMSim spd
00191 #define t_RTP   ceil (3.0 * MEM_CYCLE)          // TODO don't know yet. default in DRAMSim for DDR2 & DDR3 = 6 ddr half cycles 
00192 #define t_RFC   ceil (127.5 * CYCLE_2_NS)       // FIXME Taken from DRAMSim spd
00193 */
